content:
Are we supposed to use the functions generated by the put in function file in our pset?

Or are we supposed to copy and paste the parts of code that overlap in each part? e.g., pasting my solution from part a into the corresponding sections of part b?
subject: Question about Put in Function File

content:
<md>You are free to copy the previous code part into the next part of the problem set!

For instance, this is from the instructions:
"Copy over your solution from Part A into the corresponding sections in ps1b.py"</md>
